title: Las Manos
subtitle: The Hands
meta_desc: Learn about hands in Spanish (manos, dedos, tocar, aplaudir) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish body parts, las manos Spanish, hands in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids

pages.title: Las Manos
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A happy toddler looking at their open hands with wonder and curiosity.

pages.title: Tengo dos manos.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A smiling child holding up both hands showing all ten fingers.

pages.title: Mis manos pueden tocar.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child gently touching a soft fluffy bunny with their hands.

pages.title: Mis manos pueden aplaudir.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A joyful child clapping their hands together with musical notes around them.

pages.title: Mis manos pueden pintar.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child finger painting on a large paper with colorful handprints.

pages.title: Mis manos pueden abrazar.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child giving a warm hug to a teddy bear with their little hands.

pages.title: ¬°Amo mis manos!
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A happy child waving both hands cheerfully at the viewer.
